abstract: HSBC USA, a unit of British bank HSBC Holdings, said on Monday profit fell 11 percent in the first quarter, hurt by rising credit losses. Net income for the New York-based unit fell to $273 million from $308 million, HSBC USA said in its quarterly report filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
lead_paragraph: HSBC USA, a unit of British bank HSBC Holdings, said on Monday profit fell 11 percent in the first quarter, hurt by rising credit losses. Net income for the New York-based unit fell to $273 million from $308 million, HSBC USA said in its quarterly report filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
